title: Underground Facility Identification
description: An analyst must use a combination of thermal imagery and measurement and signature intelligence (MASINT) to identify a hidden underground facility.

tasks.description: Analyze nighttime thermal imagery of a suspect area to find unexplained heat signatures on the ground.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies a thermal anomaly consistent with a ventilation shaft for an underground base.

tasks.description: Analyze MASINT data (e.g., seismic, magnetic) of the same area to detect vibrations or magnetic deviations caused by underground activity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst finds corroborating evidence of underground machinery from the MASINT data.

tasks.description: Fuse the thermal and MASINT data to confirm the location and approximate size of the underground facility.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst produces a high-confidence report on the location of the hidden facility.
